tool_description: Names can be tricky to pronounce. Using the API, you can get crystal clear pronunciations to a large database of names pronounced by native speakers. Languages include Mandarin, Spanish, Hindi, Arabic, Japanese and many more. The gender information and name phonetic are also available.
name: NameShouts
title: NameShouts

api_list.name: Name with Language
api_list.description: Search for a name specifying a language

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The name of the language queried in lowercase

required_parameters.name: person-name
required_parameters.description: Name of the person. Chain Names to search for multiple names like "albert-einstein"

api_list.name: All Available Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nameshouts-mashape.p.rapidapi.com/langs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nameshouts-mashape.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Name without Language
api_list.description: Use this only if you don't know the language of origin
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nameshouts-mashape.p.rapidapi.com/names/Example "albert""

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nameshouts-mashape.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nameshouts-mashape.p.rapidapi.com/names/{person_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nameshouts-mashape.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
